Subject: Disk High Utilization Error
Description:
Dear Team,

The Endpoint Protector UI console is currently displaying a "Disk High Utilization" alert. Although we have already deleted the old audit logs, the alert still persists.

Kindly schedule a call immediately and assist in resolving this issue today.

Best regards,
Dinakaran
What_We_Know__c:
15-04 Customer encounter an issue with  "Disk High Utilization" alert. 

Although they have already deleted the old audit logs, the alert still persists.
Next_Steps__c:
15-04 We have scheduled a remote session where we have clear their disk usage. 
In the meeting we have successfully removed the shadows older than 30 days and a few older backups .
They will check internally if they would like to increase the disk space.
16-04 Customer returned and they would like to increase the disk space, so we have scheduled a remote session today.
In the meeting we have successfully increase the disk space .
Solution_Comment__c: disk usage was cleared and we have also increase the disk space.
